#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType FourSome.

== Name ==

*[CFourSome FourSome]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--FourSome (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			A FourSome type is used to store up to three additional player names who play the same round of golf.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...>  player-some{0,3}  </...>
}}}
----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CPlayerSome golfml:PlayerSome] || [CPlayerSome player-some] ||  											Qualification of the player on the 2,3,4 some.					 ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CRound Round]
----
    
----
